pullRequest.title: Transfer providers discovered at build-time to new ClientBuilder instances

nodes.bodyText:
Previously I think there were REST Client tests in "main".
Does this just augment what's there? Any reason why they need to be separate?
Does it make sense to support WriteInterceptor and ReadInterceptor as well ? Though it can be done as part of another PR for sure...

beforeCommit.message: Retain all ClientRequestFilter and ClientResponseFilter impls in case of programmatic registration

afterCommit.message: Retain all ClientRequestFilter and ClientResponseFilter impls in case of programmatic registration

nodes.bodyText: @kenfinnigan can you please re-review? I took your suggestion and moved the ITs to the "main" project, which exposed a new bug on the SSL builder path in native mode. I've included the fix on these highlighted lines which mirrors what is done in org.jboss.resteasy.microprofile.client.RestClientBuilderImpl.build(Class<T>)

Transfer providers discovered at build-time to new ClientBuilder instances
